original_title: Monara Creations awarded at IDB Annual Awards 2023
original_body_lines: Monara Creations, a leader in the field of pantry manufacturing sector recently won the gold award under the wooden related Interior fit-out sector, at the IDB awards ceremony held at Nelumpokuna under the patronage of President Ranil Wickramasinghe. Notably, this was the company’s first ever major award during its 15-year-old journey of consistency and creativity.

Ranjith Nihal Kulasinghe, the Managing Director of Monara Creations says he is happy that his company is recognized by IDB and is determined to continue the quality of its products at its best. He notes that his experience in South Korea where he worked for nearly 8 years inspired him a lot in getting the business off the ground and developing it to the present standard.

Monara Creations creates spaces that inspire, delight and elevate your living experience. Whether you’re renovating your kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, or living room, their team of expert designers will bring your vision to life with the perfect blend of creativity, functionality, and style. Their approach to interior design is personalized and collaborative. They take the time to understand your preferences, lifestyle, and budget to design spaces that reflect your personality and meet your practical needs. From initial consultation to final installation, they work closely with you every step of the way to ensure your satisfaction and exceed your expectations.Apart from the local business, they closely work with several hotels in the Maldives.
